metrics.name: Number of Services Involved in the Compound Service
metrics.description: Number of services involved in the compound service

metrics.name: Services Interdependence in the System
metrics.description: Count of pairs of services which depend on each other

metrics.name: Absolute Importance of the Service
metrics.description: Number of services which depend on a service

metrics.name: Absolute Dependence of the Service
metrics.description: Number of other services a service depends on

metrics.name: Absolute Criticality of the Service
metrics.description: Product of its absolute importance (AIS) and absolute dependence (ADS)

metrics.name: Number of Services
metrics.description: Number of services in the system

metrics.name: Relative Coupling of Service
metrics.description: Degree to which a service depends on the other services

metrics.name: Relative Importance of Service
metrics.description: Degree to which the other services depend on a service

metrics.name: Service Coupling Factor
metrics.description: Indicates the overall coupling in the system, the sum over all single coupling values is set in relation with the maximum couplings that could occur in the system

metrics.name: Weighted Service Interface Count
metrics.description: Weighted number of exposed interfaces or operations per service (all weights = 1.0)

metrics.name: Service Composition Pattern
metrics.description: Fraction of services which are composite

metrics.interpretation: Value range: (0,1], very low values should be avoided
metrics.name: Inverse of Average Number of Used Message
metrics.description: Ratio between number of services and message types

metrics.name: Service Interface Usage Cohesion
metrics.description: Quantifies cohesion of a service based on the number of operations invoked by every client

metrics.name: Service Interface Data Cohesion
metrics.description: Quantifies cohesion of a service based on the number of operations sharing the same input parameter types

metrics.name: Response for Operation
metrics.description: Cardinality of the set of other service interfaces that can be executed in response to invocations with all possible parameters

metrics.name: Total Response for Service
metrics.description: Sum of RFO values for all operations

metrics.name: Mean Absolute Importance/Dependence in the System
metrics.description: Mean number of services which depend on a service / Mean number of services a service depends on

metrics.name: Mean Absolute Coupling in the System
metrics.description: Mean number of services which depend on a service or a service depends on

metrics.name: Dynamic Relative Dependence of Service
metrics.description: Degree to which a service uses other services in terms of calls

metrics.name: Dynamic Relative Importance of Service
metrics.description: Degree to which other services depend on a service in terms of calls

metrics.name: Dynamic Relative Dependence of Service in the System
metrics.description: Degree to which a service uses other services in terms of calls compared to all calls system-wide

metrics.name: Dynamic Relative Importance of Service in the System
metrics.description: Degree to which other services depend on a service in terms of calls compared to all calls system-wide

metrics.name: Cyclic Service Dependencies
metrics.description: Number of cycles in the dependencies
